<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rockslide Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2991) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 207 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=98)

**Prerequisites**
[Elementalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2986)

</column>

---

You enhance your spell with elemental earth, causing chunks of stone to litter the ground. If the next action you use is to Cast a non-cantrip Spell that affects an area, a number of 5-foot squares in the area equal to the spell level become difficult terrain for 1 round. These squares must be on the ground, and the entire area of difficult terrain must be contiguous. The spell gains the [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55) trait.
name: Rockslide Spell
